Subrecord.name: ONAM
Subrecord.desc: List of Records Existing in Multiple ESMs

Element.name: Player Flag
Element.desc: Seems to set if a race is playable or not, also has values to designate as a vampire evolution of another race

Element.name: Base Health
Element.desc: Seems to be half of the game value

Element.name: Base Magika
Element.desc: Seems to be half of the game value

Element.name: Base Stamina
Element.desc: Seems to be half of the game value

Element.name: Check-Boxes
Element.flags: Hostile;Recover;Detrimental;3;No Hit Event;5;6;7;Dispel Events;No Duration;No Magnitude;No Area;FX Persist;No Recast;Gory Visuals;Hide in UI;16;17;18;19;20;Power Affects Magnitude;Power Affects Duration;23;24;25;Painless;No Hit Effect;No Death Dispel;29;Ward?;31

Element.name: Taper Weight
Element.desc: Somehow controls the tapering of the spell over time, 0-1 typically

Element.name: Taper Curve (dec before last 2 digits)
Element.desc: Somehow affects the tapering of spell duration, 0-2 typically

Element.name: Taper Duration
Element.desc: Controls how fast the duration tapers off assumably, 0-5 typically

Element.name: SecondAV Weight
Element.desc: Only valid if SecondAV is set, typical values of 0-2

Element.name: Effect Archetype
Element.desc: The basic type of effect to apply (0-44).
Element.options: Value Mod;0;Script;1;Dispel;2;Cure Disease;3;Absorb(PrimaryAV);4;Dual Value Mod;5;Calm;6;Demoralize(Confidence);7;Frenzy;8;Disarm;9;Command Summoned;10;Invisibility;11;Light;12;13;13;14;14;Lock;15;Open;16;Bound Weapon;17;SummonCreature;18;DetectLife;19;Telekinesis;20;Paralysis;21;Reanimate;22;Soul Trap;23;Turn Undead(Confidence);24;Guide(Hazard:Used only by Clairvoyance);25;Werewolf Feed;26;Cure Paralysis;27;Cure Addiction;28;Cure Poison;29;Concussion;30;Value and Parts(PrimaryAV is used, not used in game);31;Accumulate Magnitude;32;Stagger;33;Peak Value Mod(PrimaryAV and SecondAV select which actor value to modify, note that SecondAVWeight is not used);34;Cloak(RelatedID is a spell (only some spells supported, either/both hand?));35;Werewolf(DisablesCharacterMenus)(RelatedID is a race);36;Slow Time;37;Rally;38;Enhance Weapon(RelatedID is an enchantment);39;SpawnHazard;40;Etherealize;41;Banish(Confidence);42;Spawn Scripted Ref;43;Disguise;44;
